properties.entry: SELECT * FROM CATEGORY WHERE MOD(CATE_NO,10)=0 AND CATE_NO<100
SELECT * FROM CATEGORY WHERE MOD(CATE_NO,10)!=0 AND CATE_NO BETWEEN ? AND ?+10 AND CATE_NO<100
SELECT* FROM( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM,A.* FROM ( SELECT PRO_NO,PRO_NAME,PRO_CODE,PRO_MAKER,PRO_PRICE,PRO_AMOUNT,PRO_STATUS,SELL_STAT FROM PRODUCT ORDER BY PRO_NO DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT COUNT(*) COUNT FROM PRODUCT

INSERT INTO PRODUCT( PRO_NO, PRO_NAME, PRO_PRICE, PRO_CODE, PRO_MAKER, PRO_DES, CATE_BNO, CATE_SNO, PRO_SIZE, PRO_AMOUNT, PRO_LEVEL, DELIVERY_PRICE ) VALUES( SEQ_PNO.NEXTVAL, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, 2500 )
INSERT INTO ATTACHMENT( FILE_NO, REF_PNO, ORIGIN_NAME, CHANGE_NAME, FILE_PATH ) VALUES( SEQ_FNO.NEXTVAL, SEQ_PNO.CURRVAL, ?, ?, ? )
UPDATE PRODUCT SET PRO_STATUS='Y', SELL_STAT='N' WHERE PRO_NO=?

SELECT PRO_NO, PRO_NAME, PRO_CODE, PRO_MAKER, PRO_DES, CATE_BNO, CATE_SNO, PRO_SIZE, PRO_PRICE, PRO_AMOUNT, LEVEL_NAME, PRO_STATUS, SELL_STAT FROM PRODUCT JOIN PRODUCT_LEVEL USING (PRO_LEVEL) WHERE PRO_NO=?
SELECT ORIGIN_NAME FROM ATTACHMENT WHERE REF_PNO=?
SELECT * FROM CATEGORY WHERE CATE_NO=?
UPDATE PRODUCT SET PRO_NAME = ?, PRO_PRICE = ?, PRO_CODE = ?, PRO_MAKER = ?, PRO_DES = ?, CATE_BNO = ?, CATE_SNO = ?, PRO_SIZE = ?, PRO_AMOUNT = ?, PRO_LEVEL =? WHERE PRO_NO = ?
DELETE FROM ATTACHMENT WHERE REF_PNO=?
DELETE FROM PRODUCT WHERE PRO_NO=?
UPDATE PRODUCT SET PRO_STATUS='N', SELL_STAT='Y' WHERE PRO_NO=?

SELECT* FROM( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM,A.* FROM ( SELECT PRO_NO,PRO_NAME,PRO_CODE,PRO_MAKER,PRO_PRICE,PRO_AMOUNT,PRO_STATUS,SELL_STAT FROM PRODUCT WHERE INSTR(PRO_NAME,?)>0 ORDER BY PRO_NO DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT COUNT(*) COUNT FROM PRODUCT WHERE INSTR(PRO_NAME,?)>0
INSERT INTO PRODUCT(PRO_NO, PRO_NAME, PRO_PRICE, CATE_BNO, CATE_SNO, PRO_STATUS,SELL_STAT,PRO_IMAGE) VALUES(SEQ_PNO.NEXTVAL,?,?,10,11,'N','Y',?)
SELECT COUNT(PRO_NO) COUNT FROM PRODUCT WHERE PRO_STATUS = 'N' AND SELL_STAT ='Y' AND CATE_BNO =10
SELECT COUNT(PRO_NO) COUNT FROM PRODUCT WHERE PRO_STATUS = 'N' AND SELL_STAT ='Y' AND CATE_BNO =10
